metadata.title: CVE-2021-47040 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:io_uring: fix overflows checks in provide buffersColin reported before possible overflow and sign extension problems inio_provide_buffers_prep(). As Linus pointed out previous attempt didnothinguseful, see d81269fecb8ce ("io_uring: fix provide_buffers sign extension").Do that with help of check_<op>_overflow helpers. And fix structio_provide_buf::len type, as it doesn't make much sense to keep itsigned.
